Title: If Cats Disappeared from the World
Writer: Genki Kawamura (based on the novel by), Yoshikazu Okada (screenplay)
Actors: Gaku Hamada, Mieko Harada, Anna Ishii, Aoi Miyazaki
Plot: Young mailman finds out he has no time left due to a terminal disease. Suddenly he is approached by a devil that offers him to live more time if he eliminates something from the world. ...
